move rd, rs.name: Move Register
move rd, rs.description: Move contents of GPR[rs] to GPR[rd]

la rd, label.name: Load Address
la rd, label.description: Load address of label into GPR[rd]

lb rd, (rt).name: Load Byte
lb rd, (rt).description: Load byte from MEM[rt] into GPR[rd]

lb rd, immediate.name: Load Byte
lb rd, immediate.description: Load byte from MEM[immediate] into GPR[rd]

lb rd, label.name: Load Byte
lb rd, label.description: Load byte from the label address into GPR[rd]

lh rd, (rt).name: Load Half-Word
lh rd, (rt).description: Load half-word from MEM[rt] into GPR[rd]

lh rd, immediate.name: Load Half-Word
lh rd, immediate.description: Load half-word from MEM[immediate] into GPR[rd]

lh rd, label.name: Load Half-Word
lh rd, label.description: Load half-word from the label address into GPR[rd]

lw rd, (rt).name: Load Word
lw rd, (rt).description: Load word from MEM[rt] into GPR[rd]

lw rd, immediate.name: Load Word
lw rd, immediate.description: Load word from MEM[immedate] into GPR[rd]

lw rd, label.name: Load Word
lw rd, label.description: Load word from the label address into GPR[rd]
